category¶

Category controller

class spam.controllers.category.Controller(*args, **kwargs)¶

REST controller for managing categories.

edit(category_id, **kwargs)¶

Display a EDIT form.

get_all()¶

Return a full page with a list of all categories and a button to add new categories.

get_delete(category_id, **kwargs)¶

Display a DELETE confirmation form.

get_one(name)¶

This method is currently unused, but is needed for the RESTController to work.

new(**kwargs)¶

Display a NEW form.

post(category_id, ordering=None, naming_convention=None)¶

Create a new category

post_delete(category_id)¶

Delete a category.

Only delete the category record from the common db, all the assets in this category will be orphaned, and must be removed manually.

put(category_id, ordering=None, naming_convention=None)¶

Edit a category
